biotools.summary: Web-based pathway analysis platform ,which provides full access to the set of pathways that can be imported into a chassis organism such as E. coli through the application of an Extended Metabolic Space modeling framework.

bioschemas.name: XTMS
bioschemas.summary: Web-based pathway analysis platform ,which provides full access to the set of pathways that can be imported into a chassis organism such as E. coli through the application of an Extended Metabolic Space modeling framework.
